item.title: Report X-2024110443
item.description:
Report X-2024110443

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-14T12:23:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-31
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE TO FIND THE RIGHT RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER USED RESPONSE SHEET ON PAGE 11 FOR NON-FLAMMABLE GAS. RESPONDER FOLLOWED CLEAN UP PROCEDURE OUTLINED IN RESPONSE PAGE. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL OF LEAKER. LEAKER WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2024110282
item.description:
Report X-2024110282

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-30
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE SPILL. RESPONDER WENT TO PAGE 8 ON THE RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDELINES TOO CLEAN UP THE SPILL AND BROUGHT BACK THE LEAKER TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
